dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1052 IH: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on Disperse Red 167:1.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Watt introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on Disperse Red 167:1.

subsection.text: Heading 9902.03.47 of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States (relating to Disperse Red 167:1) is amended by striking the date in the effective period column and inserting 12/31/2016.
The amendment made by subsection (a) applies to goods entered, or withdrawn from warehouse for consumption, on or after the 15th day after the date of the enactment of this Act.
